The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his hands going white. Like it or not he is cold all the time. What better way to combat the cold than to shave your head.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with radiation with them dead bodies all seeming to have smoke like trails coming from them. It's learned that the desert itself can come alive if exposed to radiation and now the preacher and his group are the desert's new meal.<|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|>

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to Begin Again, where music flows through like a river. The biggest mistake to me is that the picture was pretty much devoid of magic. I think music should be in the heart of a movie about a struggling musician with love found lost.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy sharecropping owners (authentic hats, for sure!) secure their empires with heavily armed private police, forcing the poor people to congregate in heavily guarded slums.
